original_text: Everything that they did in the world has finished. If they loved people, if they hated people, if they were jealous of people, all that has finished. They no longer having anything to do with the things that happen on the earth.
korean_text: 그들의 사랑과 미움과 시기도 없어진 지 오래이니 해 아래에서 행하는 모든 일 중에서 그들에게 돌아갈 몫은 영원히 없느니라

sentences.original_text: Everything that they did in the world has finished.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 세상에서 행한 모든 것이 끝났다.

sentences.original_text: if they were jealous of people,
They no longer having anything to do with the things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 그 일들과 관련이 없다
